Player History
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1965...
Traded from Cincinnati to New York (A) on 7/4/1966 (Going to CIN: CF M. Mantle. Going to NYY: RF V. Pinson, C G. Tenace, 2B L. Boehmer, LF T. Harper)...
Injured on 4/5/1967 with a Fractured Hip, out for 6-7 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Detroit on 4/6/1970...
Traded from New York (A) to New York (N) on 4/28/1970 (Going to NYY: LF G. Gross. Going to NYM: RF V. Pinson)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Philadelphia on 4/16/1971...
Had 2000th career hit on 6/19/1971, off Billy Farmer (LA)...
Injured on 8/15/1971 with a Broken Nose, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1971...
Injured on 5/5/1972 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from New York (N) to St. Louis on 5/22/1972 (Going to STL: RF V. Pinson. Going to NYM: RF W. Horton)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/22/1972, hitting .333 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Injured on 8/6/1972 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 8 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/5/1973 to a 3-year deal worth $2,300,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1974 Allstar game...
